description: Comprehensive quiz questions covering all BIPA 1 topics for A1 level Indonesian proficiency exam preparation

quizzes.topic: Basic greetings, names, origins, and occupations

questions.questionText: How do you say 'Good morning' in Indonesian?
What is the correct response to 'Siapa nama kamu?'
How do you ask someone where they are from?
Which greeting is used in the evening?
How do you say 'See you later' in Indonesian?
What is the appropriate response to 'Apa kabar?'
How do you introduce yourself saying 'My name is Maria'?
Which greeting is used at noon/afternoon?
How do you ask 'How are you?' in Indonesian?

options: Let me introduce myself, my name is Budi
questions.correctAnswer: Let me introduce myself, my name is Budi

questions.questionText: How do you say 'Nice to meet you' in Indonesian?
How do you ask someone's age?
What is the correct response to 'Dari mana kamu?'
How do you say 'Hello' informally in Indonesian?
How do you ask 'What is your nationality?'
How do you say 'Thank you' in Indonesian?

quizzes.topic: Personal pronouns, family members, and descriptions

questions.questionText: Choose the correct personal pronoun for 'we' (inclusive):
How do you say 'My father is tall' in Indonesian?
What is the difference between 'kami' and 'kita'?
options: Kami includes the listener, kita doesn't
Kita includes the listener, kami doesn't
Kami is formal, kita is informal
questions.correctAnswer: Kita includes the listener, kami doesn't

questions.questionText: How do you say 'My mother is kind'?
How do you say 'They are students'?
How do you say 'He is handsome'?
How do you say 'We (exclusive) are from Indonesia'?
How do you say 'She is funny'?

quizzes.quiz: Topic 3 - Time, Dates, and Daily Routines
quizzes.topic: Days, months, time telling, and daily activities

questions.questionText: How do you ask 'What time is it?' in Indonesian?
How do you ask 'What day is today?'
How do you say 'half past seven' (7:30)?
How do you ask 'What date is today?'

quizzes.topic: Food items, ordering, and expressing preferences

questions.questionText: How do you say 'I like coffee' in Indonesian?
What does a waiter ask when taking your order?
How do you express dislike for something?
How do you say 'I want to drink tea'?
How do you ask 'What do you want to eat?'
How do you say 'The food is delicious'?
How do you say 'I am full'?
How do you ask for the bill at a restaurant?
How do you ask 'Where is the school?'
How do you say 'next to' in Indonesian?
How do you ask 'Where are you going?'
How do you say 'between' in Indonesian?
How do you say 'across from' in Indonesian?
How do you ask 'How much does it cost?'
What is 'tiga puluh tujuh' in numbers?
How do you say 'twenty-five' in Indonesian?
How do you ask 'Do you have change?'
How do you say 'ninety-nine' in Indonesian?
How do you say 'receipt' in Indonesian?
How do you say 'one hundred thousand' in Indonesian?

quizzes.topic: House parts, object descriptions, and existence

questions.questionText: How do you say 'There is a book on the table'?
How do you say 'There isn't a car in the garage'?
How do you say 'It's raining heavily'?
How do you ask 'How's the weather?'
How do you say 'The weather is nice'?
How do you say 'I like sunny weather'?
How do you ask 'What transportation do you take to campus?'
Complete this sentence: 'Saya pergi ke Jakarta naik...'
How do you say 'I go to work by motorcycle'?
options: Saya pergi kerja naik sepeda motor
questions.correctAnswer: Saya pergi kerja naik sepeda motor

questions.questionText: How do you ask 'How long does the journey take?'
How do you say 'The train is late'?
How do you say 'It's hot today'?
How do you say 'It's raining heavily'?
How do you ask 'How's the weather?'
How do you say 'The weather is nice'?
How do you say 'I like sunny weather'?

quizzes.topic: Sentence structure, negation, and question words

questions.questionText: Which word is used to negate verbs and adjectives?
Which word is used to negate nouns?
Which sentence follows correct Indonesian word order?
How do you negate 'Dia guru' (He/She is a teacher)?
Which is the correct negative form of 'Saya suka film'?
How do you negate 'Buku ini mahal' (This book is expensive)?
How do you ask 'How many books?'
Which is the correct question form: 'Kamu makan apa?'
How do you say 'I don't go to school'?
What's the difference between 'apa' and 'yang mana'?
options: Apa is general 'what', yang mana is 'which one'
Apa is formal, yang mana is informal
Apa is for objects, yang mana is for people
questions.correctAnswer: Apa is general 'what', yang mana is 'which one'

questions.questionText: How do you make a yes/no question from 'Dia mahasiswa'?

quizzes.topic: Comprehensive vocabulary practice across all topics
